extendedInfo.description: Spirit, by Marco Mazzoli. The critically acclaimed iPhone hit now on Android!Specially for the Android version: both Spirit and Spirit HD (tablet version) included in the same package. Buy once and play both versions of the game on your different devices.Simple and fun to play. No shooting. No on-screen controls. Just slide your finger and Spirit will mimic your movements. Check out what people are saying about it:â¢ "Spirit is a paradigm example of independent game development for the iPhone" - 'Must Have', No DPad â¢ "If you're looking for a challenging new arcade experience, this one's easy to recommend" - Touch Arcadeâ¢ "Spirit is a budget gem you donât want to miss" - TouchGenâ¢ "One of the best arcade-style apps on the App Store right now" - GameZeboâ¢ "The experience is incredibly fluid and seamless. It just feels right, and no amount of screen-shots can do it justice" - themacfeed.comâ¢ "Hypnotic, compelling stuff" - The Sunday Timesâ¢ "Slick control scheme meets fantastic visual effects and sound design; this is the complete arcade package" - Games Uncovered Take control of Spirit in an intense retro inspired arcade experience, reinvented for Android devices.Guide Spirit against many different enemy types, and distort space to force them into another dimension.Features a fluid, easy to play yet hard to master control system. Relative movement allows you to keep your finger out of the way of the action.Combine links and combos to build up huge scores. Fight your way through increasingly challenging waves, uniquely generated for each game.App2SD supported. Please email any questions.If you have already purchased the HD version and would like to upgrade to the XHD, please purchase the XHD version and email us your Google Wallet order number for both your HD and XHD purchases and we'll refund the HD purchase.TROUBLESHOOTING:Below are solutions to common problems but feel free to email us if you are still having any problems and we'll get back to you.* If having purchased the game you get a license failure, this is because the purchase may take some time to be recorded on the Google license server. It will resolve within a few hours or you can try restarting your device and reinstalling.* If you get "Not compatible with your device" from the Market App, please try clearing your Market App Cache (Settings, Applications, Market, Clear Cache) and restarting your device.* If your download is declined, your credit card authorisation will have failed. Please update your card details (usually the address doesn't match) and retry the purchase.* The game uses Google's standard licensing service. It will use the internet to retrieve a license which will expire periodically and then be automatically renewed. The longer you have the game, the longer the time between license renewals.If you have any other problems or other feedback, please don't hesitate to drop us an email and we'll get back to you.Small Print: VAT added within EU. May require license from Google & collect anonymous stats.

reviews.title: Xperia tablet z
reviews.comment: Runs perfectly. Great music and wonderful game play. Fully recommended.
reviews.author: Preston Wilson

reviews.title: SGS2
reviews.comment: This game is amazing and very addicting, no doubt probably the best game ive played on an android. Arcade like gameplay yet unique on a whole different level. Best game ever! I strongly recommend!
reviews.author: Julian De La Cruz

reviews.title: Very addictive and beautiful
reviews.comment: This is a simple, addictive game that has captured my attention for hours.  My boyfriend actually steals my phone so he can play as well!  The colors and graphics are beautiful and I really enjoy the soundtrack :)
reviews.author: Erica Swick

reviews.title: Crap
reviews.comment: Does not run on samsung galaxy s4. Quits as soon as you try to launch it. Total crap.
reviews.author: Gary Dotzlaw

reviews.title: Ditch scoreloop. Please integrate Google Play Games Services.
reviews.comment: Great game, If would be awesome with g+ sign in, cloud save, and achievements. Cheers.
reviews.author: Daniel Higgins

reviews.title: Broken on 2013 Nexus 7
reviews.comment: Crashes on startup. Also missing integration with Google Play Games.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work since Android 4.3 update!!!!!
reviews.comment: This was one of my favorite games but the Android 4.3 update killed it!  The game won\'t even open now. I hope the developers read these reviews.
reviews.author: Randy McKenzie

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Great game. Beautiful and colorful. Easy gameplay. Currently crashing on Nexus 7 (2013), but still worth the money.
reviews.author: Jahmal Burton

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: This is a fun game to play and the soundtrack rocks.
reviews.author: Anthony C

reviews.title: Very Addicting!
reviews.comment: Great little game that\'s easy to pick up and play. Visuals look really great on a HD screen and sounds isn\'t half bad either!  UPDATE: Seems to be crashing now every time I launch the game. Was fine a few weeks back.
reviews.author: Jack M

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work anymore
reviews.comment: Update: now doesn\'t launch at all, please fix  I face some issues when play long time 1. It freeze and does nothing then sudden exit.  2. The motion slowed down and become hard to play. I lost couple of challenges caused by these issues
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Fixed and enjoying this game again.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great Game, But....
reviews.comment: Love this game, but will not launch for last few versions. If I wipe play store data and fresh install it will work for a day, but next day when it checks authenticity with servers it wigs out and crashes on start-up. Please fix....Thank you
reviews.author: Mark Vening

reviews.title: Didn\'t work on my Samsung Galaxy GT-B5330L
reviews.comment: Shame, I was really looking forward to playing this so hopefully the game will be updated soon.
reviews.author: Cleveland Glenn, Jr.

reviews.title: Awesome game
reviews.comment: The person who made this may be a genius ;) its addictive, original,  & really fun!
reviews.author: Rachael James

reviews.title: Love it but it has a problem
reviews.comment: I played it for awhile but after a few days it started to crash right after it showed the creators name. Please fix and ill rerate :). Btw my phone is a ZTE merit.
reviews.author: Cyle Dyer

reviews.title: Crash issue
reviews.comment: Awsome game, i like everything is has. I have a problem when i open the app, it does load up & keeps force closing... please fix.
reviews.author: Jordan Cardenas

reviews.title: My absolute favorite game doesn\'t work on my new nexus 7
reviews.comment: 5 stars if this gets fixed. I bought this tablet for action games because 10.1 was hard on the fingers and hands
reviews.author: Jeremy Simpson Sr.

reviews.comment: Stopped working after an update from Google and neither Google or the developer have responded. Do not buy this game!\tDo not buy
reviews.author: Dale Underwood

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: One issue: when turning mobile data on, the game opens itself.
reviews.author: Jarom Ort
